generated_text:
In "Module 26: Data", advanced learners will dive into expert-level data management techniques. This 35-minute video covers data analysis, visualization, and interpretation. Key topics include:

* Data modeling and mining
* Advanced data visualization tools
* Data storytelling and communication

Through interactive examples and real-world case studies, learners will develop practical skills to extract insights and drive informed decisions. By the end of this module, participants will be able to effectively collect, analyze, and present complex data to stakeholders.

mcqs.question: What is the primary focus of Module 26: Data?
What is the duration of the video in Module 26: Data?

flashcards.back: The process of creating a conceptual representation of data to extract insights and relationships.
The process of using graphical representations to communicate information and insights from data.
The process of using narrative techniques to communicate insights and findings from data to stakeholders.
